data.message: Call me Eminem Slim Marshall Mathers the 3rd 0424633169 In Oz  call me u sent me a bday wish from ur private account I still have the email let's do this I want 2wrap my big wet juicy lips around ur monster in ur pants and suck it nice and good 24/7 and make u so happy money can't buy what rcu looking for I just want to see u in excatsy they way ur music makes me orgasm I've been trying to contact u and I will walk a 1000 miles in ur shoes u will love the way I lie cause I don't I will grow my beared out and let my hair down I will let my Skelton's out of the closet @ 3am I think I killed em with my determination I'm not giving up on my dream u and me together u won't know what hit u slim Marshall u will beg me for more if I'm only ment to marry Jesus Christ I would like to MaRRy you instead I know if u ask everyone that knows me would agree we belong together and u know in right we have done this dance I was there when u were in Melbourne city @ the bowling club u didn't even try 2 follow the yellow brick road to my house in Oz I gave u the directions yet you didn't come with ur bday suit oceans apart day after day I wonder if u know I really do exsist out of everyone in the world we r 2 P's in a pod we r just the right mix 4 1 another ur my ying to my Yang and my sunset and sunrise that makes me want to live to see u in my arms look what u made me do I'm glad I'm not obsessed with u but I don't know u but I know ur music and the journey u have taken me thru all this time has been ruff u have poured ur heart out and given it a lot but not ur All cause that would be asking u to show us everything u got which there is still more to come cause when u realise I'm the only one u will be too old and grey but I will still love u I love u like the trees like rain and sunshine. I L O.v.E Y.ou MaRRy Me @ least  let us be the married couple everyone wants talk about I will blow ur mind every second of the day  call me 0424633169 Oz
